Sentencas: The synthesis and electrical characterization of La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3 compounds are reported.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3

Sentencas: These compounds, with perovskite structure, have been pointed out as a promising alternative for the nickel-based cermet anode of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3

Sentencas: Polycrystalline samples, with x=0.3, 0.4, and 0.5, were prepared by the citrate technique.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3

Sentencas: The crystalline phase and the chemical compatibility with zirconia-based electrolytes were studied by X-ray diffraction analyses.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3

Sentencas: The electrical properties were studied by four-probe dc electrical conductivity sigma(T) measurements during redox cycles under both oxidizing and reducing atmospheres.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3

Sentencas: The main results show that the sigma(T) has a thermally activated behavior, and increasing Sr content increases sigma(T).
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3

Sentencas: Compounds with x=0.3 exhibited no appreciable chemical reaction with the stabilized zirconia electrolyte after heat-treatment at high temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3

Sentencas: The sigma(T) measurements evidenced the redox stability of the ceramic anode.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3

Sentencas: However, some degradation of the sigma(T) was observed on samples thermally treated at 1000 degrees C under pure hydrogen.
Titulo: Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3
Synthesis and electrical characterization of the ceramic anode La1-xSrxMn0.5Cr0.5O3
